title: Unakkulle Mirugam  English Lyrics Billa
stanzas:
Song: Unakkulle Mirugam
Singer: Ranjith
Movie: Billa 2
Lyrics : Na MuthuKumar

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Unakkulle Mirugam
thoongivida ninaikum
ezhundhu adhu nadandhaal,
aerimalaigal vedikum

Kanavugalai unavaai
kaetu adhu thudikum
Unnai adhu vilungi
undhan kaiyil kodum

Aerikaamal thaen-adai kidaikaadhu
Udhaikaamal pandhu adhu ezhumbaadhu
Vali adhudhaan uyir pilaikkum
idhu varai iyarkayin vidhi idhuthaan (2)

Mirugamena maara vendum
Bali koduthu bayamuruthu
vetta vetta thalai nimirthu

Ulagamadhu urundai illai
Nillal ulagil vadivam illai
Illakanathai nee udaithu
thatti thatti adhai nimirthu

Ingu nanban yaarum illaye
edhukum pagaivan yaarum illaye
endrum neethaan unaku nanbaney
endrum neethaan unaku pagaivaney

Vali adhudhaan uyir pilaikkum
idhu varai iyarkayin vidhi idhuthaan

Mudhal adiyil nadunga vendum
maru adiyil adanga vendum
Meendu vandhaal meendum adi
marupadi marana adi...

Adikadai nee irakka vendum
marupadiyum pirakka vendum
Urakathilum vizhithiru nee
iru vizhiyum thirandha padi

Neethaan unnaku thollaye
endrum neethan unaku ellaye
Nee thottaai kilikumullaye
Valigal irundhum valikka villaye

Vali adhudhaan uyir pilaikkum

English Translation
I tried my best :)

An Animal within you
Will try to rest itself.
If it comes out then
It will come like Volcano.

It will ask for your
dreams as food.
It will swallow you
And give back you in hand.
     
With burning, no honey
Without a kick, a ball won’t go
Its pain, which will make you live
That is the truth of nature.

Change like an animal
Make fear by hunting
Go high by killing

World is not a sphere
In shadow world, no shape
Break the grammer, and
Show it high by tapping

No friend is here
No enemy for anything
Always you’re your friend
Always you’re your enemy

Its pain, which will make you live
That is the truth of nature.

First punch should shake everyone
Next one should
beat again if they raise
kill them if they raise again

you need to die frequently
need to take birth again
Even while sleeping, you should awake
keeping eyes open

You're your problem, and
you're your end
it will torn the if you touch
No pain even there is pain

Its pain, which will make you live
